title: Cristian Aragón Salazar | Portfolio
name: Cristian Aragón Salazar
about: I am an Artificial Intelligence Engineer with experience in software development and web applications. Passionate about technology and programming, I am committed to continuous learning and enjoy tackling new challenges. I am proactive, responsible, and dedicated to my work.

experience.title: Foráneos UP
experience.subtitle: President
experience.description: Guided and supervised team operations, promoted collaboration, and fostered an efficient work environment aligned with objectives.

experience.title: Burkle Exterminadores
experience.subtitle: Web Developer
experience.description: Developed and deployed the company website to attract clients, designed a blog and Q&A forum to increase interaction, and optimized structure for better navigation.

experience.title: Integra CEF (Foreign Students Commission)
experience.subtitle: Vice President
experience.description: Supervised strategic functions of team members, ensured completion of responsibilities, and developed the organization’s website.

projects.title: Foráneos UP Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Management and Analytics Platform for Foreign Students
projects.description: Developed a web platform to manage students, bulk upload data, track changes, and visualize real-time interactive analytics. Integrated Firebase for authentication and scalability.

projects.title: Quixo Bot
projects.subtitle: Data Structures and Algorithms Software
projects.description: Developed a competitive Quixo bot using minimax with alpha-beta pruning, improved heuristics, and tested across scenarios for optimal strategy.

projects.title: Kvasir-AI
projects.subtitle: Deep Learning · Medical Imaging
projects.description: Built a deep learning system for endoscopic image classification using ResNet18 and DenseNet121. Applied preprocessing (CLAHE, data augmentation) and Grad-CAM visualizations for interpretability. Achieved 88.75% accuracy with DenseNet121.

projects.title: Rubik's Cube Solver
projects.subtitle: Data Structures and Algorithms Software
projects.description: Implemented a 3x3x3 Rubik’s Cube solver using BFS, A*, and IDA*. Optimized efficiency to reduce moves and added visualization for usability.

projects.title: File Compressor
projects.subtitle: Data Structures and Algorithms Software
projects.description: Built a Huffman coding-based tool to compress and decompress files, reducing file size by up to 20%, with a simple interface.

projects.title: Mastermind
projects.subtitle: Game
projects.description: Developed a color-combination logic game with feedback hints to enhance the user experience.

projects.title: Modified RegEx
projects.subtitle: Data Structures and Algorithms Software
projects.description: Developed software to create and test regular expressions, optimized processing, and designed an interactive interface for real-time validation.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Website
projects.description: Developed and manage a personal portfolio using Next.js, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, and Shadcn/UI to showcase projects, experience, and achievements. Integrated responsive design and animations for a modern professional presentation.

projects.title: Foreigner's Corner
projects.subtitle: Website
projects.description: Designed a support website with FAQs for international students, improving accessibility and usability.

projects.title: Portfolio - OLD VERSION
projects.subtitle: Website
projects.description: Developed and manage a personal portfolio using Python and the Reflex framework to showcase projects and achievements.
